title: Food Cost Management

title: Software for Multi Store Ecommerce
description: This system is designed for multi store ecommerce system. It includes both a dashboard to handle merchant's account and inventories and a mobile app for consumer with multi store ecommerce app

Design and develop the interactive interfaces such as user login, registration, cart, scrollable list, QRcode generation and read the data for QR scan.
Worked in API which was written in to process the data from the mobile app.

KeyAchievementDetails.details: Added a new module to the existing .net MVC web application which was developed in angular 9 and incorporated as an iframe
Worked in new technology, mobile app development in react native and .net core 2.0.
Enhanced the knowledge of state management and implemented the redux structure in mobile application and NGRX in Angular project

title: GBcare Case Management System

The complex business logics were written stored procedures and views in the database in order to optimize the reporting system
Conducted extensive testing and debugging to ensure system stability and accuracy of the data processing

Had an experience with Web API, and SQLBI for reporting (SSRS)
Implemented robust and scalable solutions to handle complex health data, workflows, and compliance requirements
Successfully delivered a comprehensive health case management system within a given time frame and received a positive feedback from clients
